content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dispenser
inventory=[{"type": "firework_rocket", "quantity": 20, "index": 11}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 39, "index": 15}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 42, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 31}, {"type": "orange_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 33}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 7, "index": 37}, {"type": "elytra", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a dispenser, I need to place cobblestone, bow, and redstone in the crafting grid. I will start by placing cobblestone in the top left corner (slot 1) of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1
